html:
12.23.23  12:27 am   do you like mac and cheese

      almost

12.23.23  12:01 am   do you think most flat earthers actually think the earth is flat

      i think maybe 9 people think the earth is flat. that may or may not be the majority of flat-earthers, depending on how many flat-earthers there are. regardless, it is my opinion that there are more flat-eartherers than flat-earthers. just saying 'flat-earther' is usually enough to become a flat-eartherer

12.22.23  11:33 pm   How have you been feeling lately?

      i can't quite describe

12.22.23  10:53 pm   Did you know bight, dight, eight, fight, hight, light, might, night, right, sight, tight, and  wight are all valid scrabble words? 

      no, but that wouldn't surprise me

12.22.23  10:40 pm   lydian dominant?

      overnamed, overdeclared. kind of like bending your collar and left shoelace a certain way and then giving a title to that combination of folds, which, let's face it, you're not even going to keep for the whole day

12.22.23  10:27 pm   What do you do when you just don't know, but you kinda think maybe you don't wanna know, but you need to know?

      ...................learn

12.22.23  10:25 pm   what do you do if you sit down to write something but your fingers don't make anything good happen

      write down what bad happens

12.22.23  9:06 pm   Wait since when are the answers purple?

      just occasionally when i mess it up and don't notice until the next day. i'm embarrassed, but i'm optimistic that most people will forgive me. the reason i think that is because of the unshakable sense of self-confidence i have

12.22.23  7:32 pm   is your real book in pristine condition or is it all tattered and covered in coffee stains?

      neither

12.22.23  7:07 pm   how to recharge my ideas? my head hurts and writer's block is really setting in. i don't want to do these stupid fucking applications anymore

      you might have to take a day off

12.22.23  5:22 pm   when you work on your 3d video stuff, is it mostly planned ordo you make it up as you go?

      i've done it both ways

12.22.23  5:20 pm   Have you ever eaten a persimmon?

      not that i know of

12.22.23  3:59 pm   Is the sun just the default religion?

      just about

12.22.23  3:54 pm   what do you want for christmas?

      it would be nice if the days would start getting lighter again in the northern hemisphere

12.22.23  3:09 pm   do you prefer up and down or left and right

      apparently left and right

12.22.23  2:36 pm   Is my bed real

      i'm not sure

12.22.23  2:14 pm   When you noticed that the questions page answer color had been messed up for a couple weeks did it bum you out?

      yes, although in real time it was not weeks, it was only displayed that way for about 22 hours. my own clumsy mistake. fixed now

12.22.23  1:49 pm   how do i continue making music i am losing inspiration and motivation :(

      i think this begs the question 'do you want to continue'. i'm seeing mixed opinions from you about this, and i think that has to be settled first before you can proceed

12.22.23  1:28 pm   how the hell do you write an essay

      i have no idea. i suppose it would help to know what an essay is

12.22.23  1:08 pm   Slowly but surely, you are becoming a creativity idol to me. Your artistic expression is so refreshing to observe when I feel creativly burnt out.

      oh i wasn't even expecting a kindness delivery at this hour

12.22.23  1:05 pm   what did you have for breakfast?

      lunch

12.22.23  12:40 pm   should i get up out of bed today (ive been laying down awake for the past 3 hours today)

      yes

12.22.23  12:38 pm   are you good at science

      a little bit

12.22.23  10:10 am   What countries feel like they're the same country, but aren't. It's Italy and France for me, for some reason. 

      lichtenstein and luxembourg, but that would change if i started learning more about them

12.22.23  9:43 am   Whenever you say you'd like to make new song/video to be your favorite, does it mean that the newest song/video you make becomes your favorite?

      i wish

12.22.23  9:29 am   Do you think music can be uhh you know how its like its kinda like umm because when you break it and and think about it its uhhh

     yes

     what do you think of swords?

      they are a symbol of peace, or at least i hope they are

12.22.23  9:10 am   you ever answered a question then proceeded to hate your answer looking back on it? 

      yes

12.22.23  9:09 am   leapfrogging off the question below about lyrics/instrumentals, do you enjoy any instrumental music? or are Songs the apex of the thing for you? 

      instrumental music can indeed be very enjoyable. but it seems to be the best when it's linked to something, if not words then some other thing. Think of how many people adore the music in their favorite video game

12.22.23  8:23 am   what is the purpose of being

      it's multi-purpose

12.22.23  7:47 am   have you ever considered doing a live show some day?

     yes

     if not, is it for the same reasons you don't make albums?

     no

12.22.23  6:39 am   what happened that made the answers render in the same purple font as the questions after 12.21.23  3:13 pm ?

      extra tag. fixed now

12.22.23  3:52 am   how do i get a job to afford survival 

      ask everyone you know how they've gotten jobs before. there are a lot of different answers out there

12.22.23  3:23 am   does music intuition precede music theory?

      yes

12.22.23  2:05 am   how can I write a personal email without sounding cheesy or overly formal?

      i'm not sure. i actually don't know how to sound either of the 2 ways you mentioned

12.22.23  1:14 am   do you drink water

      yes

12.22.23  12:54 am   I am tired but whenever I try to sleep I instantly have energy. How do I tell my brain to stop being silly?

      you could try telling it in english, but i don't think that's going to work

12.22.23  12:45 am   what are your opinions on the word "silly"?

      i don't like it very much

12.22.23  12:06 am   do you plan to go back on the vibe chamber again

      yes, it should be january 19

12.21.23  11:36 pm   how do i stop being a buzzkill?

      first you'll have to train someone else to do it

12.21.23  10:30 pm   why are you so cool

      that's your fault

12.21.23  10:13 pm   opinions on cheese?

      hard to believe

12.21.23  9:05 pm   What's your favorite word in latin

      antidisestablishmentarianism

12.21.23  8:43 pm   pickle?

      that's correct

12.21.23  7:11 pm   have you ever thought about thinking?

      when it reaches that point, then it's gone just a little too far. if it's thought-on-thought then i'd say it's time to get feelings involved

12.21.23  6:13 pm   How and why are your songs so magnificent? And how are the animations for the songs so great as well?

      maybe because you are cultivating kind statements

12.21.23  4:32 pm   Should I learn math? (It is starting to hinder my professional ability)

      in that case then maybe you should stop

12.21.23  4:27 pm   I am curently working on a 3d scene, but it turns out to be a lot bigger than previously tought,  and i am loosing motivation quickly. How do I keep my motivation so i can finish this project?

      the more you want it, the more motivated you'll be. but you probably can't change how much you want something. you came here to ask about it, so we know you want it at least that much

12.21.23  3:12 pm   are clementines and oranges siblings or cousins

      stunt doubles

12.21.23  3:08 pm   whats up with turtles

      if you're wondering about their speed, it's medium

12.21.23  2:20 pm   When and why is everything?

      here and now
